original_text: For I am now ready to be offered, and the time of my departure is at hand.
korean_text: 전제와 같이 내가 벌써 부어지고 나의 떠날 시각이 가까웠도다

sentences.original_text: For I am now ready to be offered
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이제 제물로 드려질 준비가 되어 있고

sentences.original_text: and the time of my departure is at hand
